Articles.Content:
How about having an option to post your mission's results in terms of flags on things or space stations built etc onto an official map world thingy.

That would allow us to all have our flags on the Mun or what ever. Filters would allow you to see just your friends flags etc.

Also having resource mining of moons, planets and asteroids. Then allow people to build space stations where new fuel can be brought fro money and this gets put into the builders account.

Possible allow some component buying or building there as well?

Perhaps that is the max maps thing?

Edited February 11, 2015 by Tim_the_Plumber
